reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF RUIZ v. SACHS, 61 A.D.2d 748 [1st Dept 1978]

caption.center: In the Matter of ISRAEL RUIZ, JR., Appellant, v. ALICE SACHS et al.,
Constituting the Board of Elections of the City of New York, Respondents,
and DIANA SANCHEZ et al., Respondents.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment, Supreme Court, Bronx County, entered on February 6, 1978, unanimously reversed, on the law and on the facts, without costs and without disbursements, and the petition validated. We find that there has been substantial compliance with subdivision 2 of section 6-140 Elec. of the Election Law.
Concur â€” Murphy, P.J., Birns, Evans and Sullivan, JJ.
